about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Gauss Tank
  • Space Anti-Paladin
  • Space Assassin
  • Space Bedouin Aiming
  • Space Bedouin with Gaffe
  • Space Force Officer
  • Space Force Soldier with Carbine Firing
  • Space Force Soldier with Carbine Running
  • Space Force Soldier with Carbine
  • Space Force Soldier with Long Rifle
  • Space Force Urban Control Officer
  • Space Gun for Hire
  • Space Hunter with Energy SMG
  • Space Hunter with Rifle
  • Space Paladin with Energy Sword
  • Space Planetary Defense Pilot Aiming
  • Space Planetary Defense Pilot with SMG
  • Space Sasquatch with Rifle
  • Space Saurian Pilot Aiming
  • Space Scoundrel with Pistol
  • Space Ship Security Crouching and Aiming
  • Space Ship Security Crouching Firing
  • Space Ship Security Running with Pistol Firing
  • Space Ship Security Running with Pistol
  • Space Tigaran Huntar

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and any Ruleset.

You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
